name: Debris (itch) (Gabriel Kokan)
description:
DOWNLOAD DEMO 1 NOW...

STORY:

After receving an anonymous tip, you venture into endless forests to find a hidden city disconnected from civilization. It is destroyed and overrun by mutants. Your job is to get into the bunker and reveal the secret past.

GAMEPLAY:

You play as a JOURNALIST so clue-reading and puzzle-solving will be of great use. As the enviroment is dangerous you come equipped with your trusty revolver. Find ammo, first aid kits and survive as you explore the mysterious ruined city. Always stay on your toes. You never know what is coming after you. So look around and be careful.

CONTROLS:

WASD - Move

V - Pick up Boxes

CTRL - Crouch

Space - Jump

F - Flashlight

Pass over generators to activate them up.

Pass over ammo and health boxes to use them.
